manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: 5° Slope Patent Design 3 in 1 Kitchen Sink Splash Guard & Kitchen Sink Organization & Silicone Faucet Drying Mat Have you been looking for sink faucet mats to keep water from splashing on kitchen countertops and bathroom sink faucets?Have you been looking for a multi-functional product that will keep your countertops dry, save countertop space and hold a few kitchen items?The following is our newly designed patented Faucet Mat, It's easy to fit your Kitchen sink, Bathroom, Restroom, Farmhouse or RV base to keep the faucets nearby clean and dry.

Before purchasing, please measure if there is enough space near your faucet for installation, referring to the following. A faucet with a diameter of less than 2.36 inches.That there must be no obstructions within a length of at least 5.9 inches on the left and right sides of the faucet.There is at least 0.79 inches from the back of the faucet to the wall.Not applicable to curved edge, shaped sinks or basins.

HIGH-QUALITY SILICONE MATERIALS KEEP YOUR COUNTERTOP DRY Silicone faucets pad new designed for faucet splash with the draining, upgrading your kitchen sink & bathroom countertop in an effort-saving way! This means never gets soggy, or any water spots by the faucet and sink. You don't need to worry about the water staying on the mat or counter.

AIR DRY IN NO TIME Dries in place so you don't need to spend time wiping down countertops. Coverage large enough to catch any spills, keep countertops dry. Two drainage gaps ensure all the caught water will flow into the sink. 5° SLOPE DESIGN 5° slope design allows for faster and smoother water discharge and faster drying. This means no puddles to clean up & no water spots by the faucet. Give your kitchen sink an effort-saving upgrade. HIGH COMPATIBILITY Silicone faucet handle drip catcher mat has a 2.48"(MAX) adjustable round hole in the middle to fit most faucets. The foldable design makes it possible to use our pad even if the distance from the outer wall of the faucet to the wall is only 0.4 inches. HEALTH AND SAFETY Safe silicone material, non-toxic and odorless, safe for you, and not crack, or bad smell. Reusable and Durable. Not need to be replaced frequently, just wash with detergent or soap and rinse with water.
They’re not only great for the kitchen sink. Use them in your RV, vanity, or bathroom & rescue yourself the headache of cleaning and organising.

How it Works Free Your Hands Free up your hands, you don't need to wipe the sink counter every time. Keep the sink surface clean and dry. It looks great. Foldable Design The foldable design makes it possible to use our pad even if the distance from the outer wall of the faucet to the wall is only 0.79 inches. Multipurpose Use Can be used as storage dish for some small things such as soap, sponge wipes etc. Specification Material: Silicone Size: 14.25 x 5.7 inch Outer Edge Height: 0.79 inch Middle Hole Diameter: 2.36inch (MAX) Product Weight: 227g / 8oz Package Includes: 1 x Silicone Sink Faucet Mat

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Make sure you measure first!
reviews.reviewText: Make sure you measure your area first, I didn’t and it doesn’t quite fit, but it does the job it is advertised to do. I’m glad I purchased this.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I have been looking for something like this for years and finally found it. This does a great job of catching water and keeping counters dry

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Exactly what I wanted. Fits, catches the water perfectly, nice slope so the water drains back in to the sink, and seems well made. Small enough to be unobtrusive, yet get the job done. I highly recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Good, material, keeps the water off of sink ledge, which was the main goal. Did not fit around our fixture as shown, cut it in half and it serves the purpose for holding liquid soap, sponge. Easy to keep clean.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Seems to be the same one we saw in a magazine that costs more than two times more. Wish we ordered the longer one but that’s my mistake.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good way to keep the area around your sink faucet clean and dry.
reviews.reviewText: We had a small issue with the tray fitting around the base of our particular faucet. We have a thick faucet so the hole in the tray was not exactly big enough so it tends to wrinkle up against the faucet. Still works and is better than it was. I have been thinking about making a small snip to make it fit better. Other than that, it works great and our counter area is dry and clean.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Worth the money
reviews.reviewText: It does its work. Keep the top of the counter clean, dry, and away from water. I love it because i have a place to rest my sponges and dish soap.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Works Great for those Water Stains
reviews.reviewText: I bought this after installing new granite countertops and single post faucet, shortly afterwards I noticed lots of water beneath the handle from people turning off the faucet with wet hands. This Is a great quality product that arrives quickly and is true to size and color. It installs in seconds and prevents hard water stains and rings from forming below the handle or from beneath the soap dispenser.
Ficou grande. Não coube na minha pia
A must in the kitchen, keeps water from spreading around your faucet
